system.notes:
Can only be worn by (usually chaos) space marines. Designed for use with Legion Weapons. Choose 3 Subsystems to add to Power Armour functionality (see Armour Upgrades)
+20 to Strength Characteristic, -10 to Fine Manipulation Tasks with anything not designed to be used with power armour. +1 Size, but enemies do not gain bonus to hit from size.
